alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 24 at 3:53PM MST until August 24 at 9:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Arizona and west central Arizona, including the following counties, in southwest Arizona, Yuma. In west central Arizona, La Paz. * WHEN...Until 745 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 353 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in Indian Wash on Highway 95 between milepost 71 and milepost 72. Up to 0.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Indian Wash on Highway 95 between MP 71 is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. This includes the following streams and drainages... Gould Wash, Angeles Wash, Los, Tyson Wash, Tenmile Wash, Mohave Wash and Indian Wash. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of North Central Yuma and South Central La Paz Counties - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
